definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料稱好重量之後，被自動送入攪拌機中。

sentences.english: Guangdong cuisine uses a great variety of materials, even including the meat snakes.
sentences.chinese: 廣東菜用料廣泛，甚至包括蛇肉。

sentences.english: The products made of well-selected wool feel soft (have a soft feel).
sentences.chinese: 用料上乘的羊毛製品，手感柔軟。

sentences.english: This material is the rose bud tea, three money, bergamot three money.
sentences.chinese: 此茶用料是玫瑰花蕾三錢，佛手三錢。

sentences.english: It serves to show the Chinese diet in materials and randomness of the rich.
sentences.chinese: 足見中國飲食在用料方面的隨意性之廣博。

sentences.english: Phase - out product control on material to reach the minimum obsolescence cost.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格控制將要淘汰的產品用料，最大程度的減少報廢。

sentences.english: These will probably be most popular for summer wear.
sentences.chinese: 這些可能將是很流行的夏裝用料。

sentences.english: In this paper the history of Chinese auto-industry and total materialconsumption are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文回顧了我國汽車工業發展簡史和用料總量。

sentences.english: The style may be simple or elaborate and the material could be muslin or satin.
sentences.chinese: 其風格或簡樸或繁雜，其用料可以是平紋細布或緞子。

sentences.english: Mix the reddish with the remaining ingredients with gloves. Packthe mixture into a 2-quart jar.
sentences.chinese: 帶上手套，將蘿蔔和剩下的用料混合拌勻。

sentences.english: Plant fiber is still the mainstream material which is used in cone speakers.
sentences.chinese: 植物纖維材料仍是揚聲器紙盆用料的主流。

sentences.english: Smaller pieces are interlocked into the layout for an economical use of the fabric.
sentences.chinese: 爲了節省用料，較小的樣板可連接起來排料。

sentences.english: Set fire to the production methods and the use of materials and steamed pastries similar to the production.
sentences.chinese: 火燒的製作方法和用料與油酥饃的製作大同小異。

sentences.english: And the needed materials take the standing grain flower fish as tastiest .
sentences.chinese: 其中用料以禾花魚爲最鮮美。

sentences.english: The suit manufacturer Youngor has strict requirements for the materials they use.
sentences.chinese: 服裝用料有十分嚴格的要求。

sentences.english: Fabric mainly uses high-quality short plush, custom-made products according to customer's request materials.
sentences.chinese: 布料主要採用優質短毛絨，定做產品按客戶要求用料。

definition: to work with one's hands/manual work/workmanship
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
way of handling sth/method for making/work method/recipe/practice/CL:個|个[ge4]
to arrange food on a plate/to plate up/food presentation/(watchmaking) balance wheel
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
